about_the_game:
In a world filled with creatures known as Cambros. Get ready for a top-down 2D Pixel Art JRPG. Collect various Cambros and make a team to explore your heart's content.

Cambrox is about collecting Cambro's, battling trainers, testing your limits, and making it to the fabled Glizzy Stadium.

Collect over 200 unique Cambro's with 12 unique types in this action-packed adventure. Battle in single battle and trio rotation battles to really test your limits as a master.

After beginning this game go onto a crazy journey filled with action and adventure and see what the world of Cambrox has in store for you.

With multiple save slots feel free to try different modes while keeping your main save safe.

  • Easy Mode (For a chill and stress-free adventure)

  • Normal Mode (Intended Experience)

  • Hard Mode (Scaled Up Battles all Cambros in Encounters Increased, better Enemy AI)

  • Nuzlocke Mode (Your Cambro's cannot be revived and level caps are set for each part of the game)

  • Speedrun Mode (For one session playthrough, has some optimizations for speedrunners like segment practice mode)

Super excited for you to start your journey. We are a two-person team and we really hope you enjoy our hard work. We believe love is something that makes you wanna die after it's gone, but we wanna make something you'll love that will make you wanna live forever.

name: Cambrox
short_description: Cambrox is a single-player creature-collection adventure with over 200 unique Cambros. Explore the world of Hoch and battle with your Cambros against other trainers, find the Elden Cambros, and stop a new mysterious group aiming to destroy the world!
